item.title: Bihar background
item.description: Task Aggregate data on Bihar Data Sourced from Wikipedia and Wikimedia commons Electoral calendar Table 1: Election calendar with focus on Bihar date kind house body 2020 state lower NA 2021 national upper NA 2021 state upper local authority 2022 state upper legislative assembly 2023 state upper graduate 2023 state upper teachers 2024 state upper legislative assembly 2024 national lower NA 2026 state upper legislative assembly 2026 state upper graduate 2026 state upper teachers 2026 state upper nominated Other information R packages used include magick1, rsvg2, rvest3, and, kableExtra4.
